title: Danshi Koukousei wa Kyou mo Onaka ga Suiteiru
original_name: 男子高校生は今日もお腹がすいている
sinopse:
High school boys are pretty active, whether at school or during their leisure time, so it's no wonder they're always hungry! And what better way to deal with it than to learn how to cook for themselves so they can eat whatever they want, whenever they want?

(Source: MU)
